# Metadata Viewer - Project Instructions

## Overview
Cross-platform Python GUI application for viewing image metadata with modern interface supporting Mac and Windows.

## Project Features
- Auto-detect all image formats (JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP, TIFF, WebP, etc.)
- Complete metadata display (EXIF, file properties, image info)
- Modern PyQt6-based interface
- Smooth cross-platform support
- Image preview with metadata panel

## Checklist

- [x] Project structure created
- [x] Dependencies configured (PyQt6, Pillow, piexif)
- [x] Main GUI application implemented
- [x] Metadata parsing utilities created
